trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 擴充 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder" /> Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

trans-unit.source: Extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolderDesigner> class if you want to create a designer for a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolderDesigner>類別，如果您想要建立該類別可擴充的設計工具<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolderDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolderDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否可以調整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以調整控制項大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 設計階段用來代表控制項的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The root component is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 根元件不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> object containing the regions to use for generating design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> 物件，包含用於產生設計階段 HTML 的區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time using the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> 物件，取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The root component is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 根元件不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object from which to extract content.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 物件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the persistable inner HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項內部保存的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The persistable inner HTML of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內部保存的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> instance to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new content for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 的新內容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the content of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 物件的內容。
